data.expected_result: The YouTube player should load the live stream but with a message stating "Live stream offline"
data.short_description: Discord restarts when opening live stream
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a live stream on YouTube Gaming - Send the Youtube Gaming link to a server - End the live stream - Make sure that the live stream has ended and there's no playback when you go back to the link - Click on the YouTube video player in the channel you posted the link to - Observe
